Subject: Netwrix failing to authenticate to SQL database
Description: We are trying to setup Netwrix for the first time. But it's failing to authenticate to the newly stood up SQL database. Need help to investigate what the issue is.
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: Initial setup with cloud based SQL
What_We_Know__c: Apparently SQL no longer an issue but they do not have enough rights to run the installer
Next_Steps__c: Confirming the environmental part (account used, permissions)
Solution_Comment__c: DBO is necessary to init setup, the script grants only schema level rights
